item.description:
Join us for a new adventure - great conversation with new/old friends, food, drinks, and TRIVIA at the Sambar.

This will be a new night of FUN added to our calendar if participation goes well.

Our members love Trivia and we have been working with local restaurants to sponsor an early Trivia for Fall/Winter. We worked a schedule out with Sambar - a cozy restaurant in Newport with great food and drinks...

Thursday night is a great night for fun out in Newport and it won't interfere with Monday night football ...

Please sign up and/or send me a message if you are interested in Thursday Night Trivia.

Arrive at 8PM and we are going to try an 8:30PM start time. It normally lasts between 1 1/2 - 2 hours.

Sambar is working on an advertising campaign to bring this night to life as well as offering prizes!!

Parking - Until October you have to follow what the signs say for parking in Newport. The last event our members found easy parking in the Ocean Breeze Cafe lot - less than two blocks after Sambar on the left.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Lonnie or ask for Newport Friends Meetup Group and if you cannot find us - please call: 829-8516
item.name: Early Trivia - Sambar - Always an Adventure - it is going to be a fun night!
